alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 5:17PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Scotts Bluff and northwestern Morrill Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 416 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moomaws Corner, or 19 miles east of Scottsbluff, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lake Minatare and Lake Minatare Campground around 445 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
